verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
You are my strength when I am weak,
You are the treasure that I seek,
You are my all in all.
Seeking You as a precious jewel,
Lord to give up I'd be a fool,
You are my all in all.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Jesus Lamb of God,
Worthy is Your name (2x)

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
You've taken my sin my guilt my shame,
Rising again I'll bless Your name,
You are my all in all.
When I fall down You pick me up,
When I am dry You fill my cup,
You are my all in all.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
I was in chains and now walk free,
Nothing to give, yet You loved me,
Thought of me above all.
You made me to be set apart,
Work within me Your perfect heart,
Till You are all in all.
